Package controller

Class MainScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Main controller class, point of entry for user. User can: search part and product tables add a part or product modify a part or product delete a part or product
    Author:
    JosÃ© L DÃ¡vila Montalvo

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the controller. Contains logic to set the tableview and search the tableview. Uses a filtered list class and a predicate to filter the list of part objects and then displays the found parts in the tableview.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • partsAddButton

        public void partsAddButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Takes the user to the add part scene, default is Inhouse.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - add button press
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error loading the view

      • partsModifyBtn

        public void partsModifyBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        User selects a part to modify and it takes the use to the part modification screen. The information from the selected part gets sent to the other controller. If the user selects an Inhouse part, they will be sent to the Inhouse screen. If the user selects an Outsourced part, they will be sent to the outsourced screen.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - modify button press
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error loading the view

      • partsDeleteBtn

        public void partsDeleteBtn()
        Button deletes the selected part. User is prompted for confirmation before the part is deleted.

      • prdAddBtn

        public void prdAddBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
               throws java.io.IOException
        takes the user to the add product screen
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - add button press
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error loading the view

      • prdModifyBtn

        public void prdModifyBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        User selects a product to modify and it takes the use to the product modification screen. The information from the selected product gets sent to the other controller.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - modify button press
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error loading the view

      • prdDeletBtn

        public void prdDeletBtn()
        Prompts the user to delete the selected product. If the product has associated parts, the user will be advised the product cannot be deleted.

      • exitBtn

        public void exitBtn()
        Exits the program
